1.0.name: wordpress/embed-light-field-photos
1.0.description:
You can easily add the photos from the Lytro website to your posts and pages. All you have to do is copy the URL of the photo and drop it into your post, the same as you do with Youtube videos. The url is automatically changed so the photo is displayed on your blog.

Author website: Light field photography
